textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 56in / 142.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 100% polyester. Shell: 100% rayon. Fabric: Crepe. Neon embroidery adds a pop of color to a flowing crepe maxi dress. Adjustable spaghetti straps crisscross the open back, and the long skirt is slit to mid-thigh. Lined. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Every pair of Dolce Vita shoes embodies the meaning of the brand’s name: “the good life.” Van Lamprou and Nick Lucio launched Dolce Vita in 2001 with the young, the restless, and the glamorous as their muse. In 2014, Dolce Vita was acquired by Steve Madden, which has preserved the label’s go-to appeal for the fun, modern girl.
